description: Secrets are just part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.
name: Hemlock Grove
Netflix Presents: The Characters
description: No rules. No expectations. A half hour to make their mark. Eight different comedians each get an episode to show their skills in comedy.

name: Bloodline
description: KA family is forced to face their past secrets and scars when the black sheep returns home.

name: Marco Polo
description: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, Marco Polo is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century Mongolia.
